title: Error with first block in each epoch
body:
# üêû Bug Report ### Description Upgraded to 3.1.0 and I am now seeing error logs at the start of every epoch. The beacon chain log does not display the first block, but will then display an error a little while later. I believe I am still attesting correctly to any blocks in slot 0. ### Has this worked before in a previous version? I don't believe I saw the issue in 3.0.0. Definitely never saw the issue in versions prior. ## üî¨ Minimal Reproduction Custom flags are --datadir, --suggested-free-recipient and --jwt-secret Paired with Geth v1.10.23 ## üî• Error Example, did not log slot 4649024, error with p2p pubsub 

[2022-09-08 14:45:00]  INFO blockchain: Synced new block block=0xf6bdb609... epoch=145281 finalizedEpoch=145279 finalizedRoot=0x882ca407... slot=4649023
[2022-09-08 14:45:00]  INFO blockchain: Finished applying state transition attestations=128 payloadHash=0x000000000000 slot=4649023 syncBitsCount=508 txCount=0
[2022-09-08 14:45:00]  INFO powchain: Ready for The Merge latestDifficulty=58224910859701665188985 network=mainnet terminalDifficulty=58750000000000000000000
[2022-09-08 14:45:10]  INFO powchain: Ready for The Merge latestDifficulty=58224936149968545461921 network=mainnet terminalDifficulty=58750000000000000000000
[2022-09-08 14:45:15]  INFO p2p: Peer summary activePeers=57 inbound=35 outbound=22
[2022-09-08 14:45:20]  INFO powchain: Ready for The Merge latestDifficulty=58224948804776661873617 network=mainnet terminalDifficulty=58750000000000000000000
[2022-09-08 14:45:23]  INFO sync: Subscribed to topic topic=/eth2/4a26c58b/beacon_attestation_13/ssz_snappy
[2022-09-08 14:45:23]  INFO blockchain: Synced new block block=0x4028413c... epoch=145282 finalizedEpoch=145280 finalizedRoot=0xd4b46626... slot=4649025
[2022-09-08 14:45:23]  INFO blockchain: Finished applying state transition attestations=80 payloadHash=0x000000000000 slot=4649025 syncBitsCount=497 txCount=0
[2022-09-08 14:45:30]  INFO powchain: Ready for The Merge latestDifficulty=58224961472217867243439 network=mainnet terminalDifficulty=58750000000000000000000
[2022-09-08 14:45:35]  INFO blockchain: Synced new block block=0x0de2d055... epoch=145282 finalizedEpoch=145280 finalizedRoot=0xd4b46626... slot=4649026
[2022-09-08 14:45:35]  INFO blockchain: Finished applying state transition attestations=128 payloadHash=0x000000000000 slot=4649026 syncBitsCount=506 txCount=0
[2022-09-08 14:45:40]  INFO powchain: Ready for The Merge latestDifficulty=58224986814110319947702 network=mainnet terminalDifficulty=58750000000000000000000
[2022-09-08 14:45:41] ERROR sync: Could not handle p2p pubsub error=could not process block: could not migrate to cold: context deadline exceeded topic=/eth2/4a26c58b/beacon_block/ssz_snappy
[2022-09-08 14:45:48]  INFO blockchain: Synced new block block=0x11f9b5c2... epoch=145282 finalizedEpoch=145280 finalizedRoot=0xd4b46626... slot=4649027
[2022-09-08 14:45:48]  INFO blockchain: Finished applying state transition attestations=64 payloadHash=0x000000000000 slot=4649027 syncBitsCount=505 txCount=0
Here are some other example error messages: 

[2022-09-08 14:39:18] ERROR sync: Could not handle p2p pubsub error=could not process block: could not migrate to cold: could not process block: could not process block header: could not update committee cache: could not update committee cache: context deadline exceeded topic=/eth2/4a26c58b/beacon_block/ssz_snappy
[2022-09-08 14:32:54] ERROR sync: Could not handle p2p pubsub error=could not process block: could not migrate to cold: could not process slot: could not process epoch: could not process registry updates: could not get active validator count: could not interface with committee cache: context deadline exceeded topic=/eth2/4a26c58b/beacon_block/ssz_snappy
[2022-09-08 14:26:30] ERROR sync: Could not handle p2p pubsub error=could not process block: could not migrate to cold: could not process block: could not process block operation: could not process altair attestation: could not verify attestation at index 58 in block: could not interface with committee cache: context deadline exceeded topic=/eth2/4a26c58b/beacon_block/ssz_snappy
[2022-09-08 14:20:07] ERROR sync: Could not handle p2p pubsub error=could not process block: could not migrate to cold: could not process block: could not process block operation: could not process altair attestation: could not verify attestation at index 34 in block: could not interface with committee cache: context deadline exceeded topic=/eth2/4a26c58b/beacon_block/ssz_snappy
Full Log: https://pastebin.com/bu1VBaTN ## üåç Your Environment **Operating System:** 
Windows 11 Pro 21H2 22000.918
**What version of Prysm are you running? (Which release)** 
3.1.0
An update, I did a reboot of the beacon chain and the error has now disappeared. So not sure what that was all about üôà

Still getting this error after restarting Nethermind and Beacon Node.

Did restart two times in a row and had exact same issue.

Once Nethermind is up and running and I restart Beacon Node only then this error is not showing up.

Error that I see every minute:
`[2022-09-18 14:00:30] ERROR sync: Could not handle p2p pubsub error=could not process block: could not validate new payload: timeout from http.Client: received an undefined ee error topic=/eth2/4a26c58b/beacon_block/ssz_snappy`

Also validator is not able to to attestations during that time, but there is no error, so seems like Beacon Node is making a silent failure

Here are some logs from Beacon Node between restarts.
